fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- While dead, choose a player at night to channel the Christmas Spirit through. The next day, your chosen player will be announced in chat.
- The night after the announcement, the chosen player will stay at home and perform no action. If they live through that night, you will be revived.
- At night while alive, choose any number of players. You will learn how many players in the chosen list are naughty (evil) and nice (good or non-evil).
- Once per game, you may Judge. If all living players in your will are correctly identified as "naughty" or "nice" (you cannot use other words than these), you deal an overkill attack to all naughty players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You begin the game as a dead player (which is revealed to all players along with your role).
- You cannot be the target of abilities while dead. (ie: Revived, reverse-seanced, used by necromancer)
- If you are killed by an evil, you can no longer use your abilities while dead.
- You can always have a will if it's disabled.
